timeline.bodyText: Add a test to parse a time without timezone. Btw, are we supporting this? or what is the behavior we discussed when using timezone values in the a string?
timeline.author: spena

replies.bodyText: The conclusion was to include a conversion function and to not store timezone information. Timezones in strings were not specified in the klip, but I think it makes sense to support it because this is basically the same thing as calling CONVERT_TZ("2017-11-13T23:59:58.999","-0100"), and it is something we already support in some filter expressions.
